Reviews.Title: Well made switches!
Reviews.Author: Sip
Reviews.Content: Got them delivered and the switches are just as good as they look in the picture. Time will tell how they stand up to corrosion and heat but I am definitely happy with what I got in the mail.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work for me
Reviews.Author: Lenny
Reviews.Content: There is absolutely nothing wrong with this product at all.  They were a little longer than described in their posting, and that didn't work for me.  Not worries though, I am sure they work just fine when length is not an issue.

Reviews.Title: Pin up or down your alarm system.
Reviews.Author: Carlos Negron
Reviews.Content: Metal pins are easy to use and install. Typical alarm installation locations. Will work for those modified locations as well.

Reviews.Title: Pinswitch DEI
Reviews.Author: Kyle
Reviews.Content: The pin switches are adjustable and made of a good quality metal with corrosion resistant properties. If you need to add a switch for your hood they are perfect for this application.

Reviews.Title: pin switches
Reviews.Author: Brian
Reviews.Content: just what you need for retrofitting an alarm or light switches anywhere you have multiple doors to put switches on.  these came with the spade terminals neede to attach the switches to the wires.

Reviews.Title: i love them
Reviews.Author: david
Reviews.Content: I have them on my doors and they work just as I need iv had no problem out of them they don't bend or break so they will work as long as u need

Reviews.Title: Great switches
Reviews.Author: SandyB
Reviews.Content: Bought these switches and was very pleased. I used them inside of my truck tool box for turning om LED lights and they work wonderfully

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Lynn Bates
Reviews.Content: Heavy duty, durable, installed easily,  ordering more for friends.  I used this product on my motor home to add security lights to my cargo bays.

ProductInfo.Features:
Sturdy, easily-adjusted switch used for protection of entry points
Self-grounding through chassis
Sturdy
Easy to Adjust
Self Grounding
ProductInfo.Name: Heavy-duty Adjustable Pinswitch
